goal: Implement the maid_generate_stubs MCP tool that wraps MAID Runner's generate-stubs command to generate test stubs from manifests

contains.name: GenerateStubsResult
contains.description: TypedDict for generate-stubs results with fields: success, manifest_path, generated_files, errors

contains.name: maid_generate_stubs
contains.description: MCP tool that generates test stubs from a manifest using MAID Runner's generate-stubs command
